body: Creatures using armor they are not proficient with do not gain the bonus per level or Hit Dice to the DR, on top of any of the other normal penalties for using armor without proficiency.
name: Using Armor without Proficiency
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Armor as Damage Reduction/Armor as Damage Reduction/Armor as Damage Reduction/Using Armor without Proficiency
